member_organisations: Masterpiece Europe currently does not have any organisations as its members. Our members are individual professionals.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Budget, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Single market, Digital economy and society, European Neighbourhood Policy, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives:
Arts and culture 
Entrepreneurship 
EU single market 
Youth and education 
Erasmus+
organisation_name: Masterpiece Europe, the European Association of Traditional Tailoring Professionals (Masterpiece Europe)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Masterpiece Europe currently is not a member of any external bodies.
relevant_communication: Currently our main mission is to raise-awareness with the EU institution on the situation of the traditional tailoring professionals so that this kind of businesses can be supported under the cultural heritage, entrepreneurship, apprenticeship policies and funding instruments of the EU.
goals__remit: Masterpiece Europe is a non-profit, membership organisation that aims to connect, support and represent the traditional tailoring professionals from across the European Economic Area.
